attributes.action: allow the Palestinian youth football team to enter Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Palestinian youth football team has been refused entry by the Foreign Office, allegedly due to lack of personal finance within the group. 
How does Britain expect to be taken seriously if it cannot even encourage sport as a method for increasing understanding between nations? 
The Prime Minister should use his good offices to ensure the Palestinian football team is allowed into the country for this tour
